channel.title: Components on ScrapComputers
channel.description: Recent content in Components on ScrapComputers

item.title: Antenna
item.description: The antenna component is connected to a network port. If connected, You would be able to send data to other antenna’s wireless!

item.title: Camera
item.description: The camera allows you to take screenshots or even render video from the world to your display! Our camera looks great while not even touching the raytracing.

item.title: Display
item.description: The display is like a monitor but in Scrap Mechanic. Allows you to draw anything on it with a computer.

item.title: Drive
item.description: A drive allows you to store anything* inside it. You can also go interact with it to modify its data there without doing it via code.

item.title: GPS
item.description: Allows you to get information on such things like velocity, rotation and etc Strucutres Data Contains GPS data worldPosition [ Vec3 ] The world position worldRotation [ Quat ] The world rotation bearing [ number ] The bearing rotation (Degrees!

item.title: Hologram
item.description: The hologram are like Displays but instead of being in 2D, its in 3D. You can show objects in 3D with this

item.title: Keyboard
item.description: It’s like a virtual keyboard! You can interact with it and then type anything and the computer will be able to read it!

item.title: Laser
item.description: The Laser is like a normal scrap mechanic sensor but instead of ON or OFF, It provides more information which could be useful for things like Robot kinematics (More like Sensor-Enhanced Kinematics)

item.title: Motor
item.description: The motor allows you to control what the bearings and pistons should do. Functions setBearingSpeed Motor.setBearingSpeed( speed ) Sets the bearing(s) speed

item.title: Network Port
item.description: The network port allows you to send data to other network ports. Lag Issue We’ve discovered a lag problem with the network system for this.
